fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Apologies to readers of later editions of Thursday’s paper who, due to a technical error, found three pages of sport from Wednesday’s paper printed in place of pages 36, 39 and 40. • A front-page article (Daily death toll reaches record high of 381 in UK, 1 April) said that new figures from the Office for National Statistics suggested almost one in four coronavirus deaths were occurring outside of a hospital setting; this should have been one in five deaths. • Other recently amended articles include: Nightingale hospital in London ‘to treat less critical Covid-19 cases’ Doubts over take-up of UK government emergency food parcels
